Class CroppedMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • CroppedMap
  • public class CroppedMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the cropped map, the map that the bot uses to make decisions on their movement.

      • getValidNeighbours

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Coordinate> getValidNeighbours​(Coordinate Coords)
        Checks each of the neighbours of the coordinate and checks whether they are valid (i.e. not a wall)
        Parameters:
        Coords - Coordinate representing the coordinates to check
        Returns:
        HashMap with key String direction and value of the coordinates corresponding to the position of the neighbour

      • getHumansPositions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> getHumansPositions()
        Gets all the coordinates of players on this cropped map and returns them in an ArrayList of coordinates
        Returns:
        ArrayList of coordinates which representing the coordinates of all humans visible on cropped map
